text: (Muhemmed)! Ewan ji te dipirsin: “Ka ji bona wan ra ci tist hatiye durist kirine.” Tu ji bona wan ra beje: “Ji bona we ra tista paqij durist buye u ewa necira wan sene, ku hun ewan hine wan zanin e, Yezdan bi we daye hinkirine, dikin. Evan sene necirvan cinecire bigirin, idi hun ewe necire bixun u hun li ser wan neciran, nave Yezdan bixunin u hun yezdanparizi bikin. Bi rasti Yezdan zu hijmar e
